description.value: Import your Bexio contacts into Zendesk
description.title: Bexio Contacts Importer for Zendesk

company_id.label: Company ID
company_id.helpText: See Settings > Addons > API-Keys in Bexio

user_id.label: User ID
user_id.helpText: Usually '1', Please contact the bexio-support if you do not know this ID.
